channel.title: Kader on Keine Mathematik
channel.description: Recent content in Kader on Keine Mathematik

item.title: Kaderprofil - Bayern München
item.description: data <- read_csv(file = file.path("../data/bayern_kader_profil_20200404.csv"), col_types = "cnnn") %>% filter(Minutenanteil > 0.05) ggplot(data, aes(x = Alter_Jetzt, y = Minutenanteil)) + geom_rect(aes(xmin = 25, xmax = 29, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf, fill = "seagreen"), alpha = 0.4) + geom_point() + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) + labs(x = "Alter", y = "Gespielte Minuten in %", title = "Kaderprofil - FC Bayern München", subtitle = "Saison 2019/2020 - Spieltag 25")
